title: Búzios Keeps Climbing as Petrobras Adds 180,000 Bpd With P-78 FPSO
summary: Petrobras has brought the P-78 FPSO online at its Búzios 6 development, adding up to 180,000 barrels per day of oil capacity and reinforcing just how central the pre-salt has become to Brazil’s production story.
